verses.text: \w These|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sheepherders|strong="H5349"\w* \f + \fr 1:1 \ft Or sheep breeders\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tekoa|strong="H8620"\w*—\w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* two \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \f + \fr 1:1 \ft Or during the two years\f* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earthquake|strong="H7494"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jehoash \f + \fr 1:1 \ft Hebrew Joash, a variant of Jehoash\f* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* said: “\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w roars|strong="H7580"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* raises \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w pastures|strong="H4999"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* mourn, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w summit|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* \w withers|strong="H3001"\w*.”

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w four|strong="H7969"\w*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w revoke|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* judgment,\f + \fr 1:3 \ft Or I will not revoke the punishment; Hebrew I will not revoke it; also in verses 6, 9, 11, and 13\f* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w threshed|strong="H1758"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* sledges \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* fire upon \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* consume \w the|strong="H7971"\w* citadels \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* gates \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*; \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ruler|strong="H3427"\w* \f + \fr 1:5 \ft Or the inhabitants\f* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Valley|strong="H1237"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aven \f + \fr 1:5 \ft Aven means wickedness.\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* wields \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w scepter|strong="H7626"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Beth-eden. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aram \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w exiled|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Kir|strong="H7024"\w*,” says the LORD.

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w four|strong="H7969"\w*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w revoke|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* judgment, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w exiled|strong="H1540"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whole|strong="H8003"\w* \w population|strong="H1546"\w*, delivering \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Edom.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H2346"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* fire upon \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* consume \w its|strong="H7971"\w* citadels.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ruler|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Ashdod \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H3027"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* wields \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w scepter|strong="H7626"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Ashkelon. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w*,” says the Lord GOD.

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w four|strong="H7969"\w*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w revoke|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* judgment, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whole|strong="H8003"\w* congregation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1546"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Edom \w and|strong="H3068"\w* broke \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* brotherhood.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H2346"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* fire upon \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* consume \w its|strong="H7971"\w* citadels.”

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Edom, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w four|strong="H7969"\w*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w revoke|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* judgment, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* brother \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stifled|strong="H7843"\w* \w all|strong="H7843"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7356"\w*; \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w anger|strong="H5678"\w* raged \w continually|strong="H5703"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w fury|strong="H5678"\w* flamed incessantly.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H1224"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* fire upon \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* consume \w the|strong="H7971"\w* citadels of \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w*.”

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w four|strong="H7969"\w*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w revoke|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* judgment, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w ripped|strong="H1234"\w* \w open|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pregnant|strong="H2030"\w* \w women|strong="H2030"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H4616"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w*.

So \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fire|strong="H3341"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* consume its citadels \w amid|strong="H8643"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w cries|strong="H8643"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w violent|strong="H5591"\w* wind \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w tempest|strong="H5591"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w exile|strong="H1473"\w* \f + \fr 1:15 \ft Possibly Milcom will go into exile; Milcom, also called Molech, was god of the Ammonites; see Leviticus 18:21 and 1 Kings 11:7.\f*— \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*,” says the LORD.
